root: ^Hey you, where do you think you're going?
^Somewhere which doesn't concern the likes of you.
^Glad to see your barbaric manners are still as refined as usual. Wish I could say the same about your appearance however.
^You seem to be having quite the expeditious stroll around the village. So I'll be brief. I overheard your conversation and I´m afraid you cannot meet the elder right now.
^Had you paid any attention to the elder´s lectures, you would know by now that it is far too dangerous to venture outside the village, especially for a girl such as yourself.
^But of course I have nothing to worry about. After all, if the beast itself and you were placed side by side, I wouldn't be able to tell who the Nian is.
^Then perhaps you should start worrying more about your own welfare, seeing as though your eyesight seems to be lacking in “refinement”
